sections.title: Context & Role in Vesta FinOps
sections.goal: Understand interviewee’s responsibilities, how they interact with Vesta FinOps scope, and the operational environment.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your day-to-day responsibilities within the Vesta FinOps project?
How does your work tie into the company’s mission of cloud-native data & platform engineering for regulated industries?
Which policies or guardrails do you interact with most frequently, and how do they shape your workflows?

sections.title: Current Cloud Cost Optimization Processes
sections.goal: Explore the existing mechanisms, tools, and metrics used in cost optimization, and how they align with company values.
sample_questions: What are the primary KPIs or SLOs you track for cloud cost efficiency?
Could you describe the flow from anomaly detection to remediation in your environment?
Which runbooks or RFCs are most critical when you respond to a cost overrun?

sections.title: Cross-Project Interactions & Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify dependencies with other projects (e.g., Quasar Billing, Nimbus Observability) and how cost data flows between them.
sample_questions: How does Vesta FinOps integrate with Quasar Billing for usage metering and cost allocation?
Can you give an example of a situation where data from Nimbus Observability helped refine a cost optimization strategy?
What challenges have you encountered in aligning FinOps guardrails with platform or SRE teams?

sections.title: Evidence-Driven Decision Making
sections.goal: Understand how decisions are justified using data, runbooks, and policy references.
sample_questions: How do you use RFC-1502 Resource Quotas & Budgets in making optimization decisions?
Can you share a case where a decision was reversed because of new evidence from cost analytics?
How do you document and communicate cost-saving measures to stakeholders?

sections.title: Risk Management & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss tradeoffs between cost savings, performance, and compliance, and the associated risks.
sample_questions: When you consider aggressive cost-cutting, how do you evaluate potential impacts on SLAs or SLOs?
What are some examples of risk mitigation strategies you’ve used when implementing new cost guardrails?
Can you describe a time when you had to balance sustainable velocity with immediate budget constraints?

sections.title: Future Outlook & Improvements
sections.goal: Gather insights on potential improvements, automation, and scaling of FinOps practices.
sample_questions: Where do you see the biggest opportunities for automation in Vesta FinOps?
How might AI-driven forecasting play a role in your future workflows?
What’s one improvement you’d prioritize if resources were unlimited?
